entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Pembroke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:08 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 03:00 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: SE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
